title: Weather Report - Mr. Gone (1978) [EAC-FLAC]
description:
Weather Report - Mr. Gone (1978)
                EAC rip (secure mode) | FLAC (tracks)+CUE+LOG -> 231 Mb
                       Full Artwork @ 300 dpi (jpg) -> 18 Mb


On Mr. Gone, Weather Report becomes merely a cover name for a Joe Zawinul/Jaco Pastorius jazz/rock/funk record production, with several guest drummers (Steve Gadd, Tony Williams, Peter Erskine), no resident percussionist, and Wayne Shorter as a still-potent solo saxophone threat. 

This album was denounced in its time as a sellout, probably on the reputation of Jaco's pulsating "River People," which is as close as WR ever came to outright disco.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tracklist:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

01. The Pursuit Of The Woman With The Feathered Hat
02. River People
03. Young And Fine
04. The Elders 
05. Mr. Gone 
06. Punk Jazz 
07. Pinocchio 
08. And Then

*1991 Columbia/468208 2

Personnel:
Josef Zawinul - Rhodes 88, ARP 2600 synths, Oberheim polyphonic synths, Sequential Circuits Prophet 5 synths, kalimbas, melodica, voice, acoustic piano
Wayne Shorter - tenor and soprano saxophone, voice on track 1
Jaco Pastorius - bass, drums (tracks 1 and 2), voice (tracks 1, 2 and 5), timpani on track 2
Peter Erskine - drums (tracks 1 and 7), hi hat (track 3)
Tony Williams - drums (tracks 5 and 6)
Steve Gadd - drums (tracks 3 and 8)
Manolo Badrena - voice (track 1
Jon Lucien - voice on track 1
Deniece Williams - voice on track 8
Maurice White - vocal on track 8
